results.content:
Hi, 

Previously I've given a 3.5 star rating, because I was absolutely amazed when I found this course after trying to figure out Unyson for 3 days! 

Now, after I've started the course, I'm ecstatic about it! Money well spent! 

I was just wondering if you know anything about the requirements of Themeforest? There's so many articles on the internet about it, but if you could add some tips and coding 'styles' that they require, it would be THE ultimate course to take if you're looking at selling on the Envato market. 

But I love your course! Job well done! :)

results.content:
Great course learned a lot about Wordpress and good Deltahost theme. The wordpress theme in this course has a lot of great features. I would recommend this course for anyone looking to learn Bootstrap to wordpress development. I'm learning a lot from this course. It's making me feel more comfortable to code because I have a solid understanding now. 

Thanks Usman Mughal, I appreciate you making the course as it has been very helpful :)
